#summary Quick start guide for PPM

= Installation =

== From the sources ==

In order to run PPM from the sources, you have to install [http://grails.org/Installation Grails 0.4.2].

Once Grails is installed, check out the PPM's sources :
{{{
svn checkout http://poker-party-manager.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ poker-party-manager
}}}

Go to the project's root directory and launch PPM :
{{{
cd poker-party-manager
grails run-app
}}}

== From the war ==

In order to run PPM from the sources, you have to install a servlet container. You can for instance use [http://tomcat.apache.org Tomcat].

Put the war in the _webapps_ directory then start Tomcat.

= Test =

Go to [http://localhost:8080/poker-party-manager].
